attributes.action: Better border treatment for UK residents
attributes.additional_details: People who pay tax in the UK with legal work visas or other rights of residence should not be subjected to the often lengthy queues for "All Other Passports" at entry ports. We should be allowed to join the newly created Registered Traveller Scheme and given similar access speeds to EU citizens, since we have already been approved by the UK government to live and work in the country.
